long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fires confetti all over your screen.

Modes:
- Confetti on every mouse click
- Party Popper
- Fireworks
- School Pride

Sourcecode: https://github.com/keramitsis/confetti-party-webextension
